metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18346 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A CSRF issue was discovered in DAViCal through 1.1.8. If an authenticateduser visits an attacker-controlled webpage, the attacker can send arbitraryrequests in the name of the user to the application. If the attacked useris an administrator, the attacker could for example add a new admin user.

criterions.comment: davical package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
